name: Zya, Inc.
description: Developer of a mobile based music creation software designed to democratize music creation and expression through imaginative games and apps. The company's Ditty application offers a technology platform that powers musical communication across a range of products and integrations with global companies enabling users to personalize their video, music, and message and collaborate with artists on a variety of platforms including web portals, mobile devices and gaming consoles.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile based music creation software designed to democratize music creation and expression through imaginative games and apps. The company's Ditty application offers a technology platform that powers musical communication across a range of products and integrations with global companies enabling users to personalize their video, music, and message and collaborate with artists on a variety of platforms including web portals, mobile devices and gaming consoles.
